title: Explore the Path Less Travelled on Croatia’s Longest Coastline
description: Cheese and wine lovers will love this sun-soaked Croatian gem, a testament to the Island of Pag’s Mediterranean culinary triumphs and only a short distance away from the esteemed beachfront nightlife of Zrće. Overlooking the sparkling Adriatic Sea, your stay at The Joel Hotel includes daily breakfast, nightly dinners, a local cheese factory tour and tasting, and a welcome cocktail on arrival.
offer_address: Jadranski put 17, 53291 Novalja, Croatia Novalja, Pag 53291
